segments.text: Lily , can you take part in our picnic this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we can go to the river , go around and have supper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing . Just wear comfortable clothes and good shoes for walking . We'll bring everything .
segments.speaker: S1
